simulator.title: Simulator
simulator.description: Correct the code to display a title and a text message.
simulator.code_snippet:
import pandas as pd

pd.title('My Streamlit App')

pd.write('This is a sample Streamlit app.')
simulator.correct_code:
import streamlit as st

st.title('My Streamlit App')
st.write('This is a sample Streamlit app.')

simulator.title: Simulator
simulator.description: Fix the code to display a simple text message.
simulator.code_snippet:
import streamlit as st

st.text("Plain text in Streamlit"))
st.write"This is a simple Streamlit app with plain text.")
simulator.correct_code:
import streamlit as st

st.text("Plain text in Streamlit")
st.write("This is a simple Streamlit app with plain text.")

simulator.title: Simulator
simulator.description: Correct the code to display a markdown header and a text message.
simulator.code_snippet:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.markdown('# Markdown in Streamlit')
st.write('This is a Streamlit app demonstrating markdown.')
simulator.correct_code:

st.markdown('# Markdown in Streamlit')
st.write('This is a Streamlit app demonstrating markdown.')
